name: Gobby's Escape
description:
Help Gobby the goblin escape a dungeon in this short, turn-based prototype!

DISCLAIMER! 
This is a prototype. There may be bugs and/or performance issues. Currently, there is minimal content, but more may be added in the future.

Credits

Minifantasy Assets by Krishna Palacio

Sound by Leohpaz

Fonts - m3x6 and m6x11 by Daniel Linssen
